entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom.
